conbody.p: runtime propertiesdefiningYou can define runtime properties in the configuration file or in a separate runtime properties file local to the .

dlentry.dd:
Use the following steps to define runtime properties in the configuration file:
In the configuration file, configure the runtime.conf.location property as follows:runtime.conf.location=embedded
Use the following format to define runtime properties: runtime.conf_<property name>=<value>For example, the following runtime property defines an Hadoop FS directory template location: runtime.conf_HDFSDirTemplate=/HDFS/DirectoryTemplate

Use the following steps to define runtime properties in a separate file:
Create a text file and save it in a directory local to the .
In the configuration file, configure the runtime.conf.location property to point to the file.
In the text file, list the runtime properties that you want to define using the following format:<property name>=<value>For example, you would define the same Hadoop FS directory template runtime property in a separate runtime properties file as follows:HDFSDirTemplate=/HDFS/DirectoryTemplate
